resources.string: Smooch lets you build rich app-to-users messaging inside your apps and websites. Try out this demo app to see what it can do for you.
Whispers allow you to send automated, targeted messages to your users that look and feel like personal notes from members of your team.
Remember to check sources to learn how to use Whispers.
Note: Whispers are only sent once per user.
You can set your own app token if you want to have a conversation with yourself.
Note: If you put your own app token, our demo Whispers will stop working.
